entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature 'Navigation bar' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68672

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Compiler Breaking Changes - post VS2019.md #68674
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - `lock` snippet and a lot of refactoring #68673
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Omit Slice call when start is 0 and 0 <= end <=length. #68660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Avoid `Span` creation when indexing into an inline array with a constant. #68642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
